name: Skol
description:
Skol (currently in early alpha)

Local Co-op action RPG telling the story of some techy Vikings who invent steam engine technology in the year 792.

Gamepad is recommended. Supports up to 3 players.

Keyboard controls:

arrow keys: to move 

shift: dash

Left Click, Right Click, Mouse Wheel Click : for attacks

V: shield

R: for stamina restore request

spacebar: for player switch

Gamepad (xbox buttons)
left stick to move and click for dash

abxy for attacks

left bumper for stamina request

right trigger: shield

select/options/back button for player switch
